item.mdl_comment: The module for the Simplciité Training platform

item.sys_desc:
Examples : 

Simple usecase
---------------------------

Editing through UI, using Simplicité indexing

```json
{
	"edition_type": "UI",
	"index_type": "simplicite"
}
```

Advanced usecase
---------------------------

Editing through Filesystem (possible git repo), using ElasticSearch indexing

```json
{
	"edition_type": "FILESYSTEM",
	"filesystem_contentdir": "/path/to/directory/to/sync/with",
	"index_type": "elasticsearch",
	"esi_config": {
		"instance": "https://elasticsearchinstance.mydomain.not",
		"index": "docs_myinstance",
		"credentials":"user:password"
	}
}
```

item.usp_param_id__sys_desc: Force password change (set at user level)

item.grp_comment: The group for the administrators of the training platform

item.obo_comment: The object that serves as container for lessons, or other categories (reflexivity)

item.fld_comment: Determines if the category and its subcategories and lessons are available on the front-end application.

item.obo_comment: This object contains the translation of a category object
The lesson object for the training, that will hold the content of a lesson.

item.fld_comment: Determines if the lesson is visible on the front-end application.
Describes the visualization mode to be used in the front-end application.

item.obo_comment: The object used to translate the lesson objects, for multilingual transport.

item.fld_comment: The HTML equivalent of the content attribute. It's this attribute that is displayed by the front-end application.

item.obo_comment: The picture object for the lessons. Used for the multilanguage support.
This object will hold the static contents of the front-end application

item.fld_comment: A code identifying the TrnSiteContent object

item.obf_query:
t.row_id in (
	select trn_taglsn_lsn_id
	from trn_tag_lsn
	where trn_taglsn_tag_id=[row_id]
)

item.obe_comment: Serves the sitemap on an endpoint
sends a JSON containing tags and theirs traduction in the current front langage

item.obd_comment: The main domain for the training module

item.lov_value: Administration of content for this instance is made through synchronization with a filesystem directory (usually a git repository) hosting the content, no UI changes are allowed for this object.

item.vig_group_id__grp_comment: The group for the administrators of the training platform

item.dt_desc: Created by module's data export on 2022-12-08 15:48:18

For CI/CD purposes in FileSystem mode, to trigger synchronization right after module import.

See https://community.simplicite.io/t/execution-post-importspec/4918/6
